name: Face-off with Fate
description:
Behold, your future self!

I am far superior to you in every way! While you swing your feeble sword trying to deflect my bullets, me and my minions will pummel you with death!

You may be asking why I'm trying to kill my past self? Well it's simple really, it's all because-

-and that's why the timeline won't implode.

Wait, did the screenshot cut me off?
